name: Tethered (itch) (materialize, Joey T. aka 'Geddon)
description:
Containment has been breached in a secret laboratory. A non-corporeal entity, that can possess living beings and see through their eyes, is on the loose.

You are that entity, and you must navigate and escape the testing facility without raising suspicion.

Use sonar-like vision and the ability to "tether" to living beings in order to navigate through 3 challenging levels.
